kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: 2019-07-14 07:07:09 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:255 - client-A8F457678984->cba8dd41-b637-4d1d-bd01-c14283557364: receive RaftClientReply:client-A8F457678984->cba8dd41-b637-4d1d-bd01-c14283557364@group-15B07A8B5462, cid=0, SUCCESS, logIndex=5, commits[cba8dd41-b637-4d1d-bd01-c14283557364:c5] 2019-07-14 07:07:09 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:255 - client-A8F457678984->cba8dd41-b637-4d1d-bd01-c14283557364: receive RaftClientReply:client-A8F457678984->cba8dd41-b637-4d1d-bd01-c14283557364@group-15B07A8B5462, cid=1, SUCCESS, logIndex=7, commits[cba8dd41-b637-4d1d-bd01-c14283557364:c8]

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Execute
Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.
kw.msg: ${output} = Found 3 items -rw-rw-rw- 1 hadoop hadoop 153909 2019-07-14 07:06 o3fs://bucket1.vol1/key1 -rw-rw-rw- 1 hadoop hadoop 22125 1970-01-31 05:03 o3fs://bucket1.vol1/ozone-87523 drwxrwxrwx - ...

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.msg: ${result} = Found 3 items -rw-rw-rw- 1 hadoop hadoop 153909 2019-07-14 07:06 o3fs://bucket1.vol1/key1 -rw-rw-rw- 1 hadoop hadoop 22125 1970-01-31 05:03 o3fs://bucket1.vol1/ozone-87523 drwxrwxrwx - ...

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
